dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4134 IH: Cecil D. Andrus-White Clouds Wilderness Redesignation Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Simpson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To redesignate the White Clouds Wilderness in the Sawtooth and Challis National Forests in the State of Idaho as the Cecil D. Andrus-White Clouds Wilderness in honor of former Idaho Governor and Secretary of the Interior Cecil D. Andrus.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Cecil D. Andrus-White Clouds Wilderness Redesignation Act.

section.header: Redesignation of White Clouds Wilderness, Sawtooth and Challis National Forests, Idaho

subsection.text: Section 101(b) of the Sawtooth National Recreation Area and Jerry Peak Wilderness Additions Act (16 U.S.C. 1132 note; 129 Stat. 477) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the subsection heading, by striking White and inserting Cecil D. Andrus-White; and
in the text, by striking White the second place it appears and inserting Cecil D. Andrus-White.

subsection.text: Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the White Clouds Wilderness shall be deemed to be a reference to the Cecil D. Andrus-White Clouds Wilderness.
